title: Falafellas
typeOfFood: Mediterranean, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Greek, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Little street food joint offering falafel along with tabouleh, hummus, and salad. The non-veg item is beef meatballs. It's in the historical center of Athens a few steps from Monastiraki, on a pedestrian street. Has Wi-Fi and lots of benches around.
